"Walking on Sunshine" by Katrina & The Waves - This upbeat and energetic song never fails to lift my spirits and get me moving, whether it's to work or a fun activity.
"Lose Yourself" by Eminem - This song is a powerful reminder to embrace the moment and go after what I want, even when it's scary or daunting.
"Bohemian Rhapsody" by Queen - This epic song has an incredible vocal range and an unforgettable chorus that always leaves me in awe of the talent.
"I Will Survive" by Gloria Gaynor - This classic disco hit is a personal anthem for me, reminding me that I am strong and can overcome any obstacle.
"Uptown Funk" by Mark Ronson ft. Bruno Mars - This funky tune always gets me in the mood to dance and have fun, even when I'm feeling stressed or overwhelmed.
